p: From 2010 to 2015, there were differences in EV71-positive rates among the 14 cities in Guangxi each year. Four cities (Fangchenggang, Chongzuo, Baise, and Gulin) had lower EV71-positive rates, and four cities (Nanning, Qinzhou, Hechi, and Hezhou) had higher EV71-positive rates during the study years ( Fig 5). In particular, a consistently low EV71-positive rate was found in Fangchenggang from 2010 to 2015.
